title: Data Science Competency Enhancement: Cognitive Processes in Multimedia Learning—Eye-Tracking Technology-Based Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Multimedia Learning Theories and Understanding of Language Education Practices
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain understanding of selective attention processes by analyzing eye-movement patterns in multimedia learning materials
Learners can identify at least three cognitive load factors in information organization and integration processes based on eye-tracking data
Learners can apply personalized multimedia content design strategies considering individual learner differences to real educational scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
